reset.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to change a clock, control, machine etc so that it shows a different time or number, or is ready to be used again
reset.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to put a broken bone back into its correct place so that it grows back together correctly
reset.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: to restart a computer without switching the power off
reset.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: to put a jewel into a new piece of jewellery
